title: Roman Mars
description: Radio producer Roman Mars discusses the connection between ’zines and radio, why he ditched science and the reason he named his show “99% Invisible”.
itunes:subtitle: Radio producer Roman Mars  discusses the connection between ’zines and radio, why he ditched science and the reason he named his show “99% Invisible”.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
itunes:author: Debbie Millman
